page.title: 13OIL RIGS
page.content: {OIL { Our D block has a lot of oil in the ground. Consequently there are three oil rigs in our D block. Because the oil lies so deep in the ground it has not been exploited before. Modern technology has made it possible to bring oil to the surface and to find it at great depth.Another oil rig has been set up recently.The oil rigs have brought badly needed jobs to the area.They have also brought new people to the area and more business for the shops,pubs and inns. Teams of drillers are working on site and big lorries bring concrete and metal pipes.The pipes are coated with tar and binding and are piled beside the drilling site.
